title: The Lion and the Mouse - Story Overview
desc: Explore the classic fable of the lion and the mouse, where kindness and friendship overcome differences.
prompt_en: Summarize the story of the lion and the mouse and explain its moral lesson.
prompt_zh: 請總結《獅子與老鼠》的故事並說明其寓意。
sample_questions: What is the main message of the lion and the mouse story?
How did the mouse help the lion?
Why did the lion let the mouse go?
What lesson can we learn from this fable?

title: Character Analysis: The Lion
desc: Understand the personality and actions of the lion in the story and how he changes.
prompt_en: Describe the lion's character traits and how he changes throughout the story.
prompt_zh: 描述故事中獅子的性格特點以及他在故事中的變化。
sample_questions: How does the lion react when the mouse plays on him?
What makes the lion decide to free the mouse?
How does the lion feel when trapped in the net?
What does the lion learn by the end of the story?

title: Character Analysis: The Mouse
desc: Explore the mouse's role in the story and its significance despite its small size.
prompt_en: Explain the mouse's role in the story and why it is important despite being small.
prompt_zh: 說明老鼠在故事中的角色及其雖小卻重要的原因。
sample_questions: Why did the mouse decide to play on the lion?
How did the mouse feel when caught by the lion?
What did the mouse promise the lion?
How did the mouse save the lion from the trap?

title: Themes and Morals in The Lion and the Mouse
desc: Discuss the key themes such as kindness, friendship, and helping others in the story.
prompt_en: Identify and explain the main themes and morals presented in the lion and the mouse story.
prompt_zh: 找出並解釋《獅子與老鼠》故事中的主要主題和寓意。
sample_questions: What does the story teach about kindness?
How is friendship portrayed between the lion and the mouse?
Why is helping others important according to the story?
Can small creatures make a big difference? How?

title: Story Retelling and Creative Activities
desc: Encourage retelling the story and engaging in creative activities based on the fable.
prompt_en: Retell the story of the lion and the mouse in your own words or create a new ending.
prompt_zh: 用自己的話重述《獅子與老鼠》的故事，或創作一個新的結局。
sample_questions: Can you retell the story in your own words?
What would you do if you were the mouse?
Imagine a new ending for the story. What happens?
Draw a picture of your favorite scene from the story.
